Armada



Armada: Airbomber? You mean he's not dead!? Uh...Put him on...I g=
uess...


(Armada says back in the commlink to Arrow confused.)

  ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
  From: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com=
 
  Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:17 AM
  Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries=
)


  Arrow: Hera that, Airbomber? She USED to be Infectra!

  Airbomber: Y=
ou can't fool me, you just got someone who sounds just like her to pose as =
her...LET ME TALK TO HER!

  Arrow: Airbomber wants to talk to you, Infectr=
a. I mean, Armada...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: *Orchid* 
=
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:10 AM
  =
  Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


    Armada



    (Armada listens to =
the voice coming over her commlink.)


    Armada: Actually, no. But that w=
as my original name. I'm Armada now. Who is this?


    (Armada says into t=
he commlink and awaits an answer from Arrow.)

      ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
      From: Soulstice Omega 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    =
  Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 10:19 PM
      Subject: Re: Big Post(with =
fries)


      Airbomber: But where do we go?

      Arrow: That's up to yo=
u, Airbomber, but I wouldn't lie to you.

      Train Wreck: Actually, he W=
OULD lie to you, but I wouldn't, and I seen this as well.

      Stranato: =
I didn't see it, but I believe it.

      Airbomber: But how can that be?

=
      Arrow: Call her.

      Airbomber: I tried that.

      Arrow: You do=
n't keep track of those kind of things? I'll call her.

      Arrow calls A=
rmada by commlink.

      Arrow: Is there anyone named Infectra there?...

=
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Alloran2@... 
     =
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 4:56 =
PM
        Subject: Big Post(with fries)


        OOC: Please add the new =
Destron base to the events page, Zardus.  Its in 
        Syria. 

        =
:::Ramjet/Wheeljack/Vulois/Time Warp::: 

        Ramjet: The one extremely=
 close to us belongs to the Trainers.  They are led 
        by a bot named=
 Prebon.  They are powerful, and are enemies of the Maximals 
        and A=
lliance.  The other one is the Blackfortress, the base a large faction 
   =
     of Predacons.  There are three Predacon leaders there, and i think we =
might 
        be able to work out an Alliance with them. 
        ~~~~~ 
 =
       Wheeljack: I'd say a sloping, hill-type shape.(Thanks for the idea Z=
ardus!) 
        ~~~~~ 
        Vulois: Yes, lets. I think we should first =
go to the Maximals, for they will 
        be the most likely to cooperate.=
  Even so, there are a lot of warlike 
        Maximals, so be ready for an=
ything. 
        ::he walks out of his cave and starts flying to the CF:: 
=
        ~~~~~ 
        ::Time Warp was releived that they were friends, unt=
il he heard what they 
        said about Infectra:: 
        Time Warp: In=
fectra?! In the Alliance?! I didnt know her very well, but she 
        def=
inately wasnt Alliance material!  Lets get out of here Airbomber, these 
  =
      guys are fools. 

        Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the=
 Yahoo! Terms of Service. 



      Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to=
 the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 



    Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject =
to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 


        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Servi=
ce.
